ImplementedSecurityControls.AccessControl: No access control is implemented in this contract, potentially allowing any user to exploit the contract.
ImplementedSecurityControls.ReentrancyCheck: No reentrancy checks are present, which is a major vulnerability in the withdrawBalance function.
ImplementedSecurityControls.FallbackFunctionality: No fallback function is defined in this contract, which could lead to loss of funds if Ether is sent directly.
